name: yappy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a dog) often making short high sounds: a yappy little dog Yorkshire Terriers have a reputation for being yappy. See
yap
More examplesFewer examplesShe owns a very yappy Chihuahua.A little yappy dog scuttered up snarling at her bare toes.Professional dog walkers hold several leashes as they shepherd their yappy four-legged charges across the streets.
